summary: Considering me and mine have been on holidays all this last week you would think I had lots to say about where we went, what we did, and what we ate.  Sadly, the weather didn't play ball and it turned out this week was spent mostly at home, and doing only local walks.  I did get to eat a decent Montreal smoked meat poutine last night, for dinner...
title: Week Notes 22 - 28

summary:
Eriq's entry in my guestbook led me to his recent post, Going from spark to a steady fire.  He describes how passions often ignite intensely before rapidly fading away. 
I completely resonate with this, just as he did after reading my post I wish I was more dedicated:

It's ridiculous how well that echoes into what I've written above...
title: We have a blogline

summary: #100DaysToOffload Steven Colbert's 15 questions to cover the full spectrum of human experience
title: Colbert's Questions

summary: I commissioned a new avatar to use for my website and some social media channels.  It's a little piggie having a beer, and I'm going to tell you how much I love it
title: This Little Piggie Went to the Pub

summary: This is the first home screen post with iOS 18.  You can read about my initial impressions.  I stand by my remark about the tinted icons: this is silly and I'm going to use it exclusively to anger the design gods...
title: July Home Screens
